EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response when new case is submitted online (e-NDA).
EmailTemplate.name: Communities: New Member Welcome Email HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to u-blox
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good to have you on board! Dear {!Receiving_User.Username},
Thank you for registering. Here is a link to log in to your account: {!Community_Url}
This link is valid for the next 7 days. After that, please go to the reset password section to get a new link.
Kind regards,
Your u-blox team
